alert.note: Alert for Frederick (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:33PM EDT until July 01 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Frederick County in north central Maryland... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 133 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boonsboro, or 9 miles west of Frederick, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Frederick, Harry Grove Stadium, Ballenger Creek, Walkersville, Braddock Heights, New Market, Discovery-Spring Garden, Clover Hill, Linganore-Bartonsville, Jefferson, Woodsboro, Buckeystown, Libertytown, Monrovia, Ijamsville, Bloomfield, Mount Pleasant, Clifton, Utica and Middletown In Frederick Md. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
